Title: 4-bedroom villa for long rent in Paphos, Cyprus - Object № 88172

Description: 4 bedroom villa for rent. This brand new villa is located in the picturesque area of Akursos in Pei, just a short drive from the famous Coral Bay, in a quiet and peaceful area. The house is located close to all necessary services such as supermarkets, shops and restaurants. The tourist areas of Coral Bay, Sea Caves and the city of Paphos can be reached in a few minutes. The villa has an internal covered area of 350 m2. a covered veranda in front and a very large open veranda in the back. The ground floor consists of an open-plan living room, a dining area, a kitchen, a toilet with branded items, one bedroom and a separate room for an office. In addition, on the same level there is a garage for two cars and a 5X1O overflow pool. The surrounding area is covered with ceramics. On the second floor there are three bedrooms with two bathrooms and two balconies (one on the facade and one at the back). The building also has an elevator. Title: 5-bedroom villa for long rent in Paphos, Cyprus - Object № 73252
Gated complex: YesGated complexes with a swimming pool
Description: A 5-bedroom villa for rent in the Aphrodite Hills complex. This is one of the largest villas of Aphrodite Hills resort, designed in an individual style and located in one of the most attractive places on the eastern plateau of the resort. It boasts the only full-size all-weather tennis court. The windows overlook the third and fourth fairways, and it is located next to the third lawn. It offers spectacular views from all rooms and has four double bedrooms on the second floor and one room with two single beds on the ground floor, all with en-suite bathrooms. Each room has air conditioning. The entrance hall leads to a double living room with a double and triple sofa, two reclining chairs, a pouf and coffee tables. The living room has a dining room with a wooden table and eight chairs. On this floor there is a comfortable guest toilet, decorated with marble. The kitchen, located next to the living room, is made of solid maple wood with granite countertops. Guests can make use of a large American refrigerator with freezer, a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. An addition to this beautiful kitchen is a modern kitchen table with chairs, which can be used as a comfortable breakfast room. On the ground floor there is a bedroom with two single beds overlooking the pool, the third green area and the sea. This bedroom has its own walk-in closet and dressing room. The private bathroom has a double dressing table, a bidet, a toilet and a heated towel rail. Immediately behind the living room and kitchen in the villa there is a veranda with a seating area, furnished with comfortable armchairs and a coffee table. This is a great place to enjoy morning coffee or tea and evening drinks while admiring the spectacular sunset view. An amazing surprise that catches your eye when you go outside is an unusually large rectangular overflow pool measuring 12 x 6 m with Roman steps, which can also be heated for an additional fee. Around this stunningly large pool there are ten sun loungers with pillows. Of course, such a villa cannot be complete without a barbecue. A large covered area with barbecue facilities and a granite-topped dining table with ten chairs is located right next to the pool and is ideal for entertaining family and friends or hosting special parties while enjoying the spectacular Cypriot sunsets. Sports fans can practice their strokes on a private tennis court, take an individual lesson by agreement with the tennis academy of the resort or take part in a friendly competition. A magnificent staircase leads to the second floor, where there are four double bedrooms. The spacious master bedroom has a built-in wardrobe/dressing room. The balcony offers a fantastic view of the third and fourth fairways and the beautiful sea in the distance. The other three bedrooms are individually decorated and boast marble bathrooms and fitted wardrobes. All bedrooms have private balconies with spectacular views of the sea and the golf course.
